display_help: Some of the Devouring Earth spores you are inhaling will do damage to your body. This damage will be ongoing for as long as you remain exposed to the spores.
display_target_help: Some of the Devouring Earth spores you are inhaling will do damage to your body. This damage will be ongoing for as long as you remain exposed to the spores.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
